## replaceVarFromString() function

替换字符串中的插值变量

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function replaceVarFromString(
  sourceStr: string,
  targetObj: Record<string, any>,
  leftMatchSymbol?: string,
  rightMatchSymbol?: string
): string;
```
